quote: Are you scared of going in to see the raghnaid [the council]?” asked a gray female pup. “Are you cag mag [crazy]? If a bear was his Milk Giver, you think he’s scared of the raghnaid?
quote_letters: ARE YOU SCARED OF GOING IN TO SEE THE RAGHNAID THE COUNCIL ASKED A GRAY FEMALE PUP ARE YOU CAG MAG CRAZY IF A BEAR WAS HIS MILK GIVER YOU THINK HES SCARED OF THE RAGHNAID
